languages.text: "Да! Эта скверна против {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} должна быть истреблена!" {n}Молодой человек вещает пылко и складно, словно комиссар. Ладонь ложится на изысканно украшенный меч, а на худом лице написана благородная ярость.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Да! Эта скверна против Императора должна быть истреблена!" {n}Молодой человек вещает пылко и складно, словно комиссар. Ладонь ложится на изысканно украшенный меч, а на худом лице написана благородная ярость.{/n}

languages.text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Да! Эта скверна против {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Императора{/g} должна быть истреблена!" {n}Молодой человек вещает пылко и складно, словно комиссар. Ладонь ложится на изысканно украшенный меч, а на худом лице написана благородная ярость.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "I do! This pestilence against the Emperor must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, and his pale face is blazing with noble fury.{/n}

"I do! This pestilence against the Emperor must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, and his pale face is blazing with noble fury.{/n}

"I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

"I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

languages.text: 「そのとおりです！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に対するこんな病害は根絶しなくてはなりません！」{n}ヤング・ザウアーバックはコミッサーのように流暢な熱弁を振るっている。立派に着こなした剣の柄に手を置くと、その青白い顔が高貴な怒りに燃え上がる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「そのとおりです！{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}皇帝{/g}に対するこんな病害は根絶しなくてはなりません！」{n}ヤング・ザウアーバックはコミッサーのように流暢な熱弁を振るっている。立派に着こなした剣の柄に手を置くと、その青白い顔が高貴な怒りに燃え上がる。{/n}

languages.text: “确实如此！这些危害{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的瘟疫必须铲除！”{n}他的话语热切而流畅，听起来就像政委一样。他将手搭在装饰精美的剑柄上，苍白的脸上燃烧着正义的怒火。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “确实如此！这些危害{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}帝皇{/g}的瘟疫必须铲除！”{n}他的话语热切而流畅，听起来就像政委一样。他将手搭在装饰精美的剑柄上，苍白的脸上燃烧着正义的怒火。{/n}

languages.text: «¡Así es! ¡Esta pestilencia para el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} debe ser exterminada!». {n}Habla con pasión y convicción, como un Comisario. Apoya la mano en la empuñadura de su espada elegantemente decorada, con su pálido rostro lleno de noble furia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Así es! ¡Esta pestilencia para el {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperador{/g} debe ser exterminada!». {n}Habla con pasión y convicción, como un Comisario. Apoya la mano en la empuñadura de su espada elegantemente decorada, con su pálido rostro lleno de noble furia.{/n}

languages.text: « Certainement pas ! Cette vermine est un fléau et doit être exterminée au nom de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ! » {n}La main posée sur la garde de son épée finement décorée, les traits tirés par une noble fureur, il parle avec autant d'aisance et d'ardeur qu'un commissaire.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Certainement pas ! Cette vermine est un fléau et doit être exterminée au nom de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Empereur{/g} ! » {n}La main posée sur la garde de son épée finement décorée, les traits tirés par une noble fureur, il parle avec autant d'aisance et d'ardeur qu'un commissaire.{/n}

languages.text: "Das stimmt! Diese Pestilenz gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} muss ausgelöscht werden!" {n}Er spricht inbrünstig und wohlklingend, wie ein Kommissar. Er legt die Hand auf den Griff seines edel verzierten Schwerts, und sein Gesicht brennt vor rechtschaffenem Zorn.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Das stimmt! Diese Pestilenz gegen den {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Imperator{/g} muss ausgelöscht werden!" {n}Er spricht inbrünstig und wohlklingend, wie ein Kommissar. Er legt die Hand auf den Griff seines edel verzierten Schwerts, und sein Gesicht brennt vor rechtschaffenem Zorn.{/n}

languages.text: "Etmez olur muyum! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator'a{/g} musallat olmuş bu salgının kökünü kazımalıyız!" {n}Bir Komiser gibi şevk ve tatlı dille konuşuyor. Solgun yüzü soylu bir alevle tutuşmuşken bir elini de zarafetle bezenmiş kılıcının kabzasına yerleştiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I do! This pestilence against the {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}Emperor{/g} must be exterminated!" {n}He talks ardently and smoothly, like a Commissar. He places his hand on the hilt of his finely adorned sword, his pale face ablaze with noble fury.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Etmez olur muyum! {g|Encyclopedia:Emperor}İmparator{/g}'a musallat olmuş bu salgının kökünü kazımalıyız!" {n}Bir Komiser gibi şevkle ve tatlı bir dille konuşuyor. Solgun yüzü, soylu bir alevle tutuşmuşken, bir elini de zarafetle bezenmiş kılıcının kabzasına yerleştiriyor.{/n}
